actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with respect to the eligibility of Indian tribes for urban development action grants.

summary.text: Amends the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to repeal a provision restricting the eligibility of Indian tribes to receive urban development action grants.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 with respect to the eligibility of Indian tribes for urban development action grants.
